title: Samsung's AI Robot Ball With a Projector Is Real and Ready to Roll in 2025 - CNET
summary:
Samsung's AI Robot Ball With a Projector Is Real and Ready to Roll in 2025

Publication Date: 2024 - Source: CNET

Samsung has officially announced that its rolling robot, Ballie, equipped with a projector, will be shipped in 2025. The robot can stream information and content and interact with smart home devices using voice commands.

  • Ballie was first showcased at CES 2020 as a home robot concept.
  • The robot can project content onto surfaces and has built-in speakers.
  • It recognizes voice commands and foot presses for interaction.
  • During demonstrations, it provided information about Las Vegas attractions and performed tasks like projecting the Uncharted movie.
  • Samsung faces competition from other companies like Amazon and LG in the home robot market.
“Make the screen bigger,” saw Ballie turn to find a new wall for projection.

This development signifies Samsung's commitment to innovative home technology, positioning Ballie among emerging home robots that enhance smart living.
newTitle: Samsung's AI Robot Ball With a Projector Is Real and Ready to Roll in 2025

summary:

Date: January 06, 2025

Source: News18

Apple has launched its AI feature with the iOS 18 update, encountering significant issues similar to those faced by other tech giants.

  • Apple's AI-powered notification tool is making major errors, causing concerns among users.
  • Media reports highlight inaccuracies in AI summary details, including false news about Rafael Nadal.
  • Apple is addressing these errors and requesting user reports on misleading notifications.
  • There are calls to pause the AI tool until the issues are resolved.
  • AI misinformation poses a widespread concern that requires urgent attention.
“We’ve seen AI go rogue before, and Google is the other big company to face issues with its technology.”

It is crucial for Apple to resolve these problems promptly to maintain user trust and prevent misinformation from spreading.

summary:

A new robot named Mirumi, unveiled by Yukai Engineering at CES 2025, is designed to entertain and engage passersby as it mounts to a purse and interacts with its surroundings.

  • The robot mimics a furball with the ability to turn and express curiosity and bashfulness.
  • Mirumi's design draws inspiration from babies, aiming to replicate joyful interactions seen in human infant behavior.

“Designed to re-create people’s joyful experiences of noticing a human baby as he/she tries to interact with them,” Yukai says regarding Mirumi's functionality.

summary:

Publication Date: January 7, 2024

Source: PhoneArena

The OnePlus 13 is set to be unveiled globally, promising robust IP68/69 protection against dust and water. This news highlights the enhanced durability expected from this model, catering to outdoor enthusiasts and professionals alike.

  • Global variants of the OnePlus 13 will have dual IP68/IP69 ratings.
  • IP68 rating allows submersion in water up to 1.5 meters for 30 minutes.
  • IP69 rating protects against high-pressure hot water jets.
  • The phone features a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with a peak brightness of 4,500 nits.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite with configurations up to 24GB RAM.
  • Rear camera includes three 50MP sensors; front camera features 32MP.
  • Includes a 6000 mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless charging.
“There is a good chance that the OnePlus 13 could be the Android phone of the year.” - Alan, PhoneArena Writer

In conclusion, the upcoming OnePlus 13 showcases advancements in smartphone durability and performance, making it a strong contender in the competitive mobile market.

title: SBI's move to up collateral-free study loans could push other lenders | Mint - Mint
summary:
SBI's Move to Offer Collateral-Free Study Loans Could Influence Other Lenders

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Mint

India's largest lender State Bank of India (SBI) has begun offering collateral-free study loans of up to ₹50 lakh for students heading out to top foreign universities, potentially compelling other lenders to adjust their offerings.

  • SBI has introduced collateral-free study loans up to ₹50 lakh.
  • The new loan limit targets students enrolling in prestigious universities like MIT, Oxford, and Harvard.
  • Industry experts suggest this could lead other lenders to enhance their loan offerings.
  • The cap was supposedly raised in late 2022, though SBI has not officially confirmed this change.
“The move may prompt more lenders to raise loan caps to attract students headed abroad,” said industry experts.

This initiative by SBI signifies a noteworthy shift in the educational loan landscape, which could lead to increased competition among lenders aiming to attract students seeking higher education abroad.
newTitle: SBI's Move to Offer Collateral-Free Study Loans Could Influence Other Lenders

title: Weekly deals: a look at renewed iPhone 16, 15, 14 and 13-series models - GSMArena.com
How to remove collections from Credit Report? - Techstory
summary:
How to Remove Collections from Your Credit Report

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Worried about Collections on your Credit Report? This guide discusses methods to remove collections from credit reports and the importance of doing so.

  • The possibility of removing collections depends on several factors, including the age of the collection.
  • Collections can be removed after seven years, but earlier removal is possible through negotiation.
  • Options for removal include sending a dispute to credit bureaus like Experian, TransUnion, and Equifax.
  • A pay-for-delete agreement is another option, where payment may incentivize the agency to remove the collection.
  • Directly requesting deletion from the collection agency can also be effective if the reasons are genuine.
"If you fail to get these collections removed from your credit report, your credit score will be affected, reducing your chances of obtaining a loan in the future."

It's crucial to pursue these methods to maintain a healthy credit score.
newTitle: How to Remove Collections from Your Credit Report

title: The LG M5 wireless OLED TV might be weirdly the perfect pick for PC gamers, especially with the Nvidia RTX 5080 on the horizon - TechRadar
summary:
LG M5 Wireless OLED TV: A Game Changer for PC Gamers

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: TechRadar

The LG M5 OLED TV is positioning itself as the ideal choice for PC gamers, boasting features like 4K resolution, 144Hz refresh rate, and wireless connectivity through its Zero Connect box.

  • The LG M5 is specially designed for PC gaming with advanced features including Nvidia G-Sync and AMD FreeSync support.
  • It provides flexibility in setup, allowing gamers to place their PC and TV further apart.
  • The new Zero Connect box allows for a cable-free experience, with improved signal transmission capabilities compared to its predecessor, the LG M4.
  • The release of the Nvidia RTX 5080 graphics card aligns perfectly with the M5's capabilities, making it an attractive option for high-performance gaming.
  • Although premium-priced, the M5 is expected to deliver a top-tier gaming experience.
"Imagine not having to move your PC setup!"

The LG M5 OLED TV is set to revolutionize the PC gaming landscape with its cutting-edge technology and user-friendly features.
newTitle: LG M5 Wireless OLED TV: A Game Changer for PC Gamers

summary:

Publication Date: 2025
Source: Mashable

Roborock has announced a new robot vacuum, the Saros Z70, at CES 2025. This unique vacuum features a robotic arm designed to pick up various small items, making it ideal for households with kids.

  • The Roborock Saros Z70 is a circular robot vacuum with a foldable robotic arm called OmniGrip.
  • It is capable of collecting small items weighing under 300 grams, including socks and tissue paper.
  • The vacuum is set to launch in the first half of 2025, but pricing details have not yet been announced.

  • The S25 and S25+ will be available in Navy, Mint, Icy Blue, and Silver Shadow, while the S25 Ultra will come in Titanium Black, Silver Blue, Grey, and White Silver.

title: Samsung showcasing a massive 18.1-inch foldable OLED display at CES - SamMobile - Samsung news
summary:
Samsung Showcases Massive 18.1-Inch Foldable OLED Display at CES

Date: January 5th, 2025 | Source: SamMobile

At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, Samsung Display revealed the world's largest foldable OLED display, measuring 18.1 inches when unfolded. This innovation reflects Samsung's ongoing commitment to advanced display technologies.

  • The foldable display measures 13.1 inches when folded.
  • It can function as a large tablet or a monitor when unfolded.
  • Samsung has not yet released a commercial product using this display.
  • Laptop manufacturers like ASUS or Lenovo may adopt the technology in the future.
“When folded, it can turn into a laptop with the top half used as the display and the bottom half as a touchscreen keyboard.”

Samsung's display advancements signal a continued evolution in flexible screen technology, despite previous setbacks in foldable device sales.
newTitle: Samsung Showcases Massive 18.1-Inch Foldable OLED Display at CES

title: The Pixel's default Camera app isn't the end-all be-all of photography on Pixels - Android Authority
summary:
The Pixel's default Camera app isn't the end-all be-all of photography on Pixels

Publication Date: August 2024 | Source: Android Authority

The Pixel Camera app has long been considered one of the best camera apps on the market. However, users seeking alternatives may find several other camera apps that offer different features and controls.

  • OpenCamera: A basic, no-frills app that allows extensive manual controls but lacks modern features like night mode.
  • GCam: An unofficial port of the Pixel Camera app offering better photo quality but requiring sideloading and device-specific versions.
  • ZeroCam: Focuses on minimal processing but has a subscription model and struggles in mixed lighting conditions.
  • ProShot: A paid app with a DSLR-like interface, offering a rich set of features including RAW capture and 4K video support.
“That’s it for my look at the best alternatives to the Pixel Camera app. Did we miss any picks?”

In summary, while the Pixel Camera remains a top choice, various alternatives cater to different photography needs and preferences.
newTitle: Exploring Alternatives to the Pixel Camera App

Belkin has introduced its Stage PowerGrip, a versatile phone accessory at CES 2025 that integrates a wireless power bank, camera grip, and stand. Designed for creators and travelers, it aims to enhance smartphone photography comfort.

  • Features a 10,000mAh battery with 7.5W magnetic wireless charging.
  • Retractable USB-C cable included for convenience.
  • Comes in multiple colors including powder blue, sandbox, and more.
  • Expected to ship in May, pricing yet to be announced.
“Holding a candy-bar-shaped handset in landscape mode for long periods doesn’t feel as comfortable as the heartier grip of a dedicated camera.”

The PowerGrip is poised to make a splash in the accessories market by addressing the needs of modern smartphone photographers.
newTitle: Belkin's Innovative Stage PowerGrip Combines Power Bank and Camera Grip

The Roborock Saros Z70 is a groundbreaking robot vacuum and mop that features a retractable mechanical arm to enhance its cleaning capabilities. It promises to take home cleaning to new heights with impressive suction power and advanced navigation technology.

  • 22,000Pa vacuum suction power with advanced TOF sensors.
